Package com.noctarius.tengi.core.exception

The exception package contains all tengi related exceptions.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionDestroyedException
    This exception class is thrown whenever a network-operation is being executed but the Connection is already destroyed, therefore this exception identifies an illegal internal state of the connection.
    ConnectionFailedException
    This exception class is thrown whenever all configured Transports are tried to make a connection but non of those were able to connect.
    IllegalTransportException
    This exception class is thrown whenever a configured Transport is not available to be used on either client or serve side.
    LoggerException
    This exception class is thrown whenever a misconfiguration happened while setting up the logger framework or retrieving a logger.
    NoSuchConnectionException
    This exception class is thrown whenever a Message is tried to be delivered to a non registered connectionId.
    NoSuchMarshallerException
    This exception class is thrown whenever a value is tried to be de-serialized but no Marshaller is found for the typeId read from the byte-stream.
    SystemException
    This exception class is the root exception of all specific tengi exception classes and also acts as a generic base exception in case of any kind of exception needs to be wrapped.
    UnknownTypeException
    This exception class is thrown whenever a type or Marshaller is being registered but has no typeId assigned.

Package com.noctarius.tengi.core.exception Description

The exception package contains all tengi related exceptions. A common base-class for all those exceptions is SystemException also contained in this package.

All tengi exceptions extend RuntimeExceptions!
